text: "A Thousand Miles" is a 2002 debut single from Vanessa Carlton and is the leading single from her debut studio album Be Not Nobody. It topped the single charts in Australia and made the top 30 in every country it charted in. It was nominated for 3 Grammy Awards in 2003. ==Formats and track listings== == References == Category:2002 songs Category:2000s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Debut singles Category:Vanessa Carlton songs
title: A Thousand Miles
